mapper.select:
select wii.lock_status, wii.stock_lock, wii.qc_lock,wii.packing_unit_name, wii.packing_qty,wii.package_specification_quantity,bw.warehouse_name,bs.storage_code,bm.material_code,bm.material_name, wii.contract_code,wii.purchase_req_order_code,wii.spec,wii.option1,wii.option2,wii.option3,wii.option4 ,bis.inventory_status_name from wms_inner_inventory wii LEFT JOIN base_warehouse bw ON wii.warehouse_id = bw.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN base_storage bs ON wii.storage_id = bs.storage_id LEFT JOIN base_material bm ON wii.material_id = bm.material_id LEFT JOIN base_inventory_status bis ON bis.inventory_status_id = wii.inventory_status_id
wii.job_status=1 and bs.storage_type=1 and wii.packing_qty > 0
and bw.warehouse_name like CONCAT('%',#{warehouseName},'%')
and bs.storage_code like CONCAT('%',#{storageCode},'%')
and bm.material_code like CONCAT('%',#{materialCode},'%')
and bm.material_name like CONCAT('%',#{materialName},'%')
and wii.packing_unit_name like CONCAT('%',#{packingUnitName},'%')
and bis.inventory_status_name like CONCAT('%',#{inventoryStatusName},'%')
and wii.lock_status = #{lockStatus}
and wii.stock_lock = #{stockLock}
and wii.qc_lock = #{qcLock}
and wii.org_id=#{orgId}
and wii.contract_code like CONCAT('%',#{contractCode},'%')
and wii.spec like CONCAT('%',#{spec},'%')
and wii.purchase_req_order_code like CONCAT('%',#{purchaseReqOrderCode},'%')
and wii.option1 like CONCAT('%',#{option1},'%')
and wii.option2 like CONCAT('%',#{option2},'%')
and wii.option3 like CONCAT('%',#{option3},'%')
and wii.option4 like CONCAT('%',#{option4},'%')
and wii.packing_qty = #{packingQty}
group by wii.warehouse_id,wii.storage_id,wii.material_id,wii.packing_unit_name,wii.inventory_status_id, wii.lock_status,wii.stock_lock,wii.qc_lock,wii.package_specification_quantity, wii.contract_code,wii.purchase_req_order_code,wii.spec,wii.option1,wii.option2,wii.option3,wii.option4
